Title: Makes it unlawful for a person under the age of 21 to possess tobacco or vaping products
Summary: Makes it unlawful for a person under the age of 21 to possess tobacco or vaping products; provides for a fine not exceeding fifty dollars and/or completion of a tobacco awareness program.
LawCode: Add Art 13-F ยง1399-mm-4, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to making it unlawful for a person under the age of twenty-one to possess tobacco and vaping products
